mapper.insert: insert into user_${storeId} (id, name, username, password, phone, warehouse_id, disabled, remark) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{warehouseId}, #{disabled}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update user_${storeId} set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}, disabled = #{disabled}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select u.id, u.name, u.username, u.password, u.phone, u.warehouse_id, u.disabled, u.remark, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, w.name as warehouse_name from user_${storeId} as u, role_${storeId} as r, user_role_${storeId} as ur, warehouse_${storeId} as w where u.id = ur.user_id and r.id = ur.role_id and u.warehouse_id = w.id and u.id = #{id};
select id, name, username, password, phone, warehouse_id, disabled, remark from user_${storeId} where username = #{username} and password = #{password};
select r.id, r.name from role_${storeId} as r, user_role_${storeId} as ur where r.id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{userId};
